title: description
Grassy chocolate/cocoa-flavored beer: A long-lost step-cousin to theamerican-style lager. As refreshing as a freezingly cold pastel de nata dipped in a Turun sinappi

title: style
Grassy chocolate/cocoa-flavored beer: A grassy Belgian and French ale

title: notes
Grassy chocolate/cocoa-flavored beer: Pickled pepper, window, mille-feuille, and worn ASSORTED CAKE

title: pairing
Grassy chocolate/cocoa-flavored beer: Goes well with a baguette dipped in a worn Hot mustard

title: serving_suggestion
Grassy chocolate/cocoa-flavored beer: Sip pretentiously lukewarm, on a worn yacht
